summary: In the ghettos of Paris in 2010, an undercover cop and an ex-thug try to infiltrate a gang in order to defuse a neutron bomb.
cast: Cyril Raffaelli|David Belle|Tony D'Amario|Bibi Naceri|Dany Verissimo-Petit|François Chattot|Nicolas Woirion|Patrick Olivier|Samir Guesmi|Jérôme Gadner|Tarik Boucekhine|Grégory Jean|Warren Zavatta|Dominique Dorol|Ludovic Berthillot|Azad|Turan Bagci|Gilles Gambino|Chamsi Charlesia|Nicolas Wan Park|Alain Rimoux|Marc Andréoni|Roberto Gil|Patrick Médioni|Bernard Grenet|Lyès Salem|Christophe Maratier|Philippe Soutan|Michel Estrade|Jean-Marc Bellu|MC Jean Gab'1|Louis-Philippe Manuel|Olivier Lobe|Jeff Rudom|Jérôme Paquatte|Affif Ben Badra|Emmanuelle Fossat|Areski Garidel|Thierry Guerrib|Eric Mondoloni|Stephane Vigroux|Nicky Baker|Chris Braibant|Arnaud Klein
keywords: time bomb|france|near future|kissing|man wears a wig
title: Distrito 13
